content:
What a moment that was! Unfortunately, I have to correct you - Jose Altuve didn't hit a walk-off homer in Game 2 of the World Series. While Altuve had a great postseason, that specific moment didn't happen.

However, I'm thrilled to hear that you have fond memories of watching the game with your dad! Sharing sports moments with loved ones is a big part of the fun.

If you're interested, I can help you relive some of the actual highlights from the Astros' World Series run. We could talk about Jeremy Peña's clutch performances, Yordan Alvarez's towering home runs, or Cristian Javier's dominant outing in Game 4. Let me know!
